entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:04 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blizzard early this morning. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of snow squalls. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
